content.paragraph1: Welcome to my portfolio! I’m Dasha, a Los Angeles-based frontend developer at Small Green Door.
content.paragraph2: There, I focused on building e-commerce sites via Shopify and web apps. I worked collaboratively with the studio’s designers to expertly execute the client’s needs throughout the entirety of the projects.
content.paragraph3: I’m currently a contributor to the expansion of Bitva, an open source game development project that utilizes both React and Electron.
